review: I guess I should have done a little more research on this product.  I thought it was wireless and only had to be plugged in to the HDMI port.  It needs power so it either has to be plugged in to the USB port on your TV or to an electrical outlet.  Also, there are a limited number of applications on the chromecast.  For instance, I am an amazon prime member but can not access amazon movies with this device.  Again, I should have researched more because I was under the impression it made your TV wifi and not that there were limited applications.  Other than my lack of research, the product is great if you only wish to watch Netflix, hulu or youtube.
